ygData.msgSnippet: If you use Eclipse 2.1.2, you may have noticed weirdness with Sourceforge CVS in recent days, such as the Eclipse CVS Repository view not offering the usual

If you use Eclipse 2.1.2, you may have noticed weirdness with Sourceforge
CVS in recent days, such as the Eclipse CVS Repository view not offering
the usual expansion-browsing of modules and directories.

A "2.1.3 Stream Maintenance Build" available at the Eclipse site seems to
help; the one I got is dated this morning ("M20040122"). See:

   http://download.eclipse.org/downloads/index.php

- Gordon
